column1: #   GROUP   = Apply to all branches in a group (by group_id)
#   BRANCH  = Apply to specific branch (by name or id)
# Target: Match tidal range at mouth (2-3m)
# Chezy coefficient controls friction and tidal damping
# Convergence length controls salinity intrusion distance
# Van den Burgh coefficient controls tidal dispersion
# Storage ratio (mangrove zones have high RS)
# POC/SPM coupling (organic matter settling with mud)
# Phytoplankton mortality (tropical: higher due to grazing)
